unnormalised: Bore, konnem tori vicharlem ki aiz kal pottachea problem-anchi gozal kitem asa munn. Sach sangchem zalear, tem chodd sadharan, khas korun amche chot'te jivitache shelli ani ami je ut'tom punn dubavo aspacho rasthevelo jevonn khatat ti. Gastroenterology, zo sumar tujea pachan sansthancho obheas (tujea tonddantlean soglem khala meren), aiz kal dher roginnak polleta.
normalised: Borem, konnem tori vicharle aazkaal lokank zaituch pottache tras kiteak zatat mhunn. Satyak sangpak gelear, tem sadharonnuch asa, khas korun amchea pishyat bharyelya jivit pod'dotink lagun ani ami zatim zatim punn dusrea-tisrea darjentlea rastyavelachem jevonn khatat dekhun. Gastroenterology, mhunnche tumchea pachon manddllichem addhyayon, tumchea tondaantlean sarke sarke soglem khal meren, aizkaal borech rogi dekhonk mellttat.

unnormalised: Ekdom vhodd gunhegar mhonnje acidity. Tunv Gurgaon-ant tujea office lagichea prasid'dh zageavelem thoddem tikhat biryani khata ani bam! Kallzachea jivak tras zata mhonnlear eke truck-in marlea bhaxen zata. Mhozo sangathi Rohan antacids chodd khattolo zori to candy asat bhaxen. To sangta Dr. Sharma Max Hospital-ant tankam telantlean kel'lea vostunche promann komi korunk sanglam mhunn. Sopeponan sangonk zatat, kiteak?
normalised: Ek motto apradhi mhunnlear acidity. Tum Gurgaaonchea tumchea office laginchya prasiddh zageavelim tikhat biryaanni khatat, ani bam! Kaallzak dukhta ti trasa truck marle bhaxen lagta. Mhojea sangatiche, Rohanak, antacids candiche bhaxen ghetach asta. To mhunntta Doctor Sharma-n, Max Hospitalantlean taka teeliy vostu komi korpak sanglem mhunn. Sangpak soglem sompem, kiteak?

unnormalised: Anik ek sadharan vost mhonnlear Irritable Bowel Syndrome, va IBS. Tem khoreponan tras divpi, pott fulon yeupak, gas ani bekarayedeok zodd zal'le pottantlean bayero yetat. Aisha mhoje gym-antleka tika tem astat mhunn thodde mhoine adim nirdharan kel'lem. Ti ek khas diet patllaita, gluten ani lactose avoid korta, ani tem modot karta dista, punn tem ek vhodd jivitache shellint bodol asa. Tinnem eka testachi ul'lekh keli tea testak colonoscopy mhonta ani tinnem ti test 35 vorsanche pirayent keli ani ti khoob molachi asli.
normalised: Dusrem sadharonn mhunnlear Irritable Bowel Syndrome, vo I-B-S. Tem khoreech dukhpik asa, foddaa yevpak laita, gas ani nitt nasloli nhayechi halchaal zata. Mhoje gymanlea Aishaak taka thoddea mhoineam adimuch diagnose kelem. Ti ek vishesh jevonn pod'dot palon korta, gluten ani lactose tallta, ani tem upyogi zata mhunn dista, punn tem ek motta jivit pod'dotintlem bodol mhunn sarkhem. Tinnem ek testachim mhaiti sangli jeaka colonoscopy mhunntta je ti pachvis vorsank asatana keli ani tem borech kharchik aslem.

unnormalised: Uprant thoddeo gambhir vostu asat, ulcer va cancer-ui. Punn bika-biki zainaka! Heo vostu lokkhon zata ten'na zolldich dhorun ghevop mukhel asa. Nemit check-ups, khas korun tujea familichea itihasan, dher mhotvache asat. Delhi-antle AIIMS bhaxilea hospitals-ant gastroenterology vibhagancheo khub boreo suvidha asat ani anubhovi doctors-ui asat. Tankam endoscopies ani biopsies bhaxilea tests-i chalu korunk zata kiteak mhonn sodhun kaddpak. Eka lagichea sombonditak DM gastroenterology-nt qualification asa tea doctor-an test keli.
normalised: Ani magir aani gombhir vostu asa, bhaxen ulcers vo cancerui. Punn pishya zaanakaat! He vostu laginchea vellar zapunk gharaiechich zavon asa. Nhemit check-up, khas korun tumkam gharant ‡§á‡§§‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∏ aslolo aslear, borech mhotvache. Dilliche A-I-I-M-S bhaxen hospitalsam kodden bore Gastroenterology vibhag zatat anubhavichea doctoram sangata. Te endoscopies ani biopsies bhaxeleo tests korun kitin cholta tem zapunk zatat. Eka laginchea ‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•á‡§µ‡§æ‡§à‡§ï‡§æ‡§ï Gastroenterologynt ‡§°‡•Ä-‡§è‡§Æ aslolea doctoran test kelem.

unnormalised: Ho, pottache problem sadharan asat, punn samanean ek samadhan asta. Tujea pottantlean yetolea vicharancher dur lakxinaka (pun intended!), ani kitem tori barem disona zalear, gastroenterologist-ak mell. Upay, illazantlean sokoil asta! Ani thoddem extra mirsango sokoil dovora. üòâ
normalised: Thoddem mhunnlear, pottache tras sadharonn asat, punn sadharonponnani ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® asa. Tumchea pottache ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ï lakx dii nakaat, punn mekhnnem! ani thoddem sarkhem dista zalear, ek gastroenterologistak bhett diiat. Nivaronn her upaaya poros boreponnaachem asta! Ani zaite tikhtek komi korunk sodat.
